name: Your Average Escape Room
description:
You discover that you are locked in a room and can’t get out. Also you happen to have a backpack full of useful items. Just like in every escape room game. What you’re gonna do? Probably INSPECT and COMBINE the items, right? These are really the only two actions you can do in this game. But the results of them are a bit different than usual. You discover that in reality it is not that easy to actually pick a lock with a screwdriver or to find a good use for your favorite adventure game item—a piece of string.

This game was created as a school project using Charles Engine.
